name: PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManagerDelegate
desc: A delegate you use to respond to peripheral discovery and manage the lifecycle of connections.

items.name: func centralManager(PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager, didDiscover: CBPeripheral, withAdvertisementData: [String : Any]?, rssi: Double)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a peripheral has been discovered during scanning.

items.name: func centralManager(PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager, willConnectTo: CBPeripheral)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the central manager is about to attempt to establish a connection with a peripheral.

items.name: func centralManager(PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager, didConnectTo: CBPeripheral)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the central manager established a connection with a peripheral.

items.name: func centralManagerStateDidChange(PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the state of the central manager has changed.

items.name: func centralManager(PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager, didDisconnectFrom: CBPeripheral, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the central manager disconnected from a peripheral.

items.name: func centralManager(PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager, didFailToConnectTo: CBPeripheral, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the central manager failed to establish a connection with a peripheral.
